channel.title: Ssh on Cyber200
channel.description: Recent content in Ssh on Cyber200

item.title: SSH master
item.description: Overview SSH (Secure Shell) is a protocol used to securely connect to remote systems over an unsecured network, It was designed to replace earlier insecure protocols such as Telnet, rlogin, and FTP by providing a secure channel over an unsecured network by using a client-server architecture, encryption, and authentication mechanisms.
